nodes.text: The Nightspider Cult Cave was the dwelling for the members of Spiderclan, a clan of Nightsisters on the planet Dathomir during the Galactic Civil War.

The Nightspider Cult cave appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
